titleStmt.title: A sermon of assurance Foureteene yeares agoe preached in Cambridge, since in other places. Now by the importunity of friends exposed to publike view. By Thomas Fuller B.D. late lecturer in Lombard Street.
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.D. for John Williams at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
